verbose_text: The observation that Rab29 acts upstream of LRRK2 was preceded by other studies showing that Rab29 recruits LRRK2 to the trans-Golgi network (TGN) or TGN derived vesicles where Rab29 normally resides, and potently upregulates the LRRK2 kinase activity.
evidence: Rab29 normally resides              , and potently upregulates the LRRK2
